Sequence Information.Source: Ganoderma lucidum (Ling zhi medicinal fungus) (Bracket fungus)
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Fungi:Botrytis cinerea (IC50=15.2 µM), Fusarium oxysporum (IC50=12.4 µM), Physalospora piricola (IC50=18.1 µM).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Function: Has antifungal activity. Lacks hemagglutinating activity towards rabbit erythrocytes. Lacks deoxyribonuclease, ribonuclease and protease inhibitory activities.

Literature.Title: Ganodermin, an antifungal protein from fruiting bodies of the medicinal mushroom Ganoderma lucidum
Literature.Author: Wang H, Ng TB.

Literature.Title: Ganodermin, an antifungal protein from fruiting bodies of the medicinal mushroom Ganoderma lucidum.
Literature.Author: Ng T.B.,Wang H.
